txt.en: Daervunn, a captain of the Rangers of the North, awaits you in Esteldín, their hidden refuge in the North Downs.\n\nThe folk of Aragorn son of Arathorn require your aid.

'You must have seen the anxious looks as you passed through the camp? It is not out of fear. Though you are a stranger, many were told to expect your arrival.

'Those anxious looks are caused more by the expectant nature under which we all live right now. Angmar stirs to the north, and we are nearly powerless to stop their advance. There is much to do...if one is willing.

'We have not much to offer you, but we are not without thanks for aid.'
In the eastern stretches of the North Downs, hidden among the hills, lay the last vestiges of a noble people, the Dúnedain of the North.
Esteldín lay in the bosom of the hills on the far eastern area of the North Downs called the Kingsfell. You are to seek out a Ranger there named Daervunn.
